üîÑ Reset Touch Panel

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This will completely reset a touch panel, removing TouchKio, kiosk software, and previous configurations.

curl -s http://zoe.local/reset-touch-panel.sh | bash

What this does:

  • Removes TouchKio and other kiosk software
  • Stops and disables conflicting services
  • Cleans autostart configurations
  • Resets display and boot settings
  • Prepares for fresh Zoe installation

After reset, run the setup command to install Zoe touch panel.

×

‚ö° Quick Setup Command

Run this command on any Raspberry Pi to automatically configure it as a Zoe touch panel:

curl -s http://zoe.local/api/touch-panels/setup-script/generic | bash

Alternative: For devices without curl:

wget -qO- http://zoe.local/api/touch-panels/setup-script/generic | bash

This command will automatically discover Zoe, install the touch panel interface, and configure the device for optimal use with Zoe.
